name: Color Blast (mikomoares, roguetaver)
description:
PROTOTYPE

This is the first prototype for a  free mobile runner game.

We plan to release the game with new  levels, upgrades and cosmetics.  We would love to hear any suggestions or feedback in the coments!

Race to the end of the level, killing enemys, and painting the level to discover new paths and secrets that were invisible to the eyes!!

CONTROLS

Jump - Space

F - Shoot

SOUNDS AND MUSIC

https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle

MADE BY:

roguetaver 

gubebra

mikomoares
